com.bigdata.rdf.spo

Class SPOStarJoin.SPOStarConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bigdata.rdf.spo.SPOStarJoin.SPOStarConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStarJoin.IStarConstraint<ISPO>, Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    SPOStarJoin

    public static class SPOStarJoin.SPOStarConstraint
extends Object
implements IStarJoin.IStarConstraint<ISPO>, Serializable
    Implementation of a star constraint for SPOs. Constraint will specify a P and O (variable or constant) and whether the constraint is optional or non-optional.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
